viewdefs.ReferenceWork:
<viewdef type="form" name="ReferenceWork" class="edu.ku.brc.specify.datamodel.ReferenceWork" gettable="edu.ku.brc.af.ui.forms.DataGetterForObj" settable="edu.ku.brc.af.ui.forms.DataSetterForObj">
            <desc>The ReferenceWork form</desc>

            <columnDef>100px,2px,170px,5px,90px,2px,160px,5px,130px,2px,161px,0px,15px,p:g</columnDef>
            <columnDef os="lnx">115px,2px,176px,5px,100px,2px,175px,5px,160px,2px,175px,15px,p:g</columnDef>
            <columnDef os="mac">130px,2px,203px,5px,100px,2px,203px,5px,185px,2px,195px,15px,p:g</columnDef>
            <columnDef os="exp">p,2px,max(p;160px),5px:g,p,2px,150px,5px:g,p,2px,151px,p,p:g</columnDef>
            <rowDef auto="true" cell="p" sep="2dlu" />
            <rows>
                <row>
                    <cell type="label" labelfor="8" />
                    <cell type="field" id="8" name="referenceWorkType" uitype="combobox" picklist="ReferenceWorkType" />
                </row>
                <row>
                    <cell type="label" labelfor="1" />
                    <cell type="field" id="1" name="title" uitype="text" cols="50" colspan="9" />
                </row>
				<row>
                    <cell type="label" labelfor="100" />
                    <cell type="field" id="100" name="text1" uitype="text" cols="50" colspan="9" />
                </row>
                <row>
                    <cell type="label" labelfor="2" />
                    <cell type="field" id="2" name="publisher" uitype="text" cols="50" colspan="5" />
                    <cell type="label" labelfor="3" />
                    <cell type="field" id="3" name="placeOfPublication" uitype="text" />
                </row>
                <row>
                    <cell type="label" labelfor="5" />
                    <cell type="field" id="5" name="volume" uitype="text" cols="10" />
                    <cell type="label" labelfor="6" />
                    <cell type="field" id="6" name="pages" uitype="text" />
<cell type="label" labelfor="116" />
                    <cell type="field" id="116" name="workDate" uitype="text" />
                </row>
                <row>
                    <cell type="label" labelfor="18" />
                    <cell type="field" id="18" name="journal" uitype="querycbx" initialize="name=Journal;title=Journal" colspan="5" />
                </row>
                <row>
                    <cell type="label" labelfor="20" />
                    <cell type="field" id="20" name="url" uitype="plugin" initialize="name=WebLinkButton;weblink=referencework" colspan="8" />
				</row>
                <row>
                    <cell type="label" labelfor="19" />
                    <cell type="field" id="19" name="text2" uitype="text" colspan="9" />
				</row>
                <row>
                     <cell type="label" labelfor="11" />
                     <cell type="field" id="11" name="remarks" uitype="textareabrief" rows="2" colspan="10" />
                </row>
                <row>
                    <cell type="subview" viewname="Authors" id="10" name="authors" initialize="name=Agent" colspan="12" rows="3" />
                </row>
                <row>
                    <cell type="separator" label="Attachments" colspan="13" />
                </row>
                <row>
                    <cell type="subview" id="attachments" viewname="ObjectAttachment" name="referenceWorkAttachments" initialize="btn=true;icon=ReferenceWorkAttachment" />
                </row>
            </rows>
        </viewdef>
